fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s true that older immigrants make up a disproportionate number of those who have poor English, although they’re still in a small minority.

fact_check_explanation_title: What does obesity cost the economy?
fact_check_explanation_summary: We’ve looked into the claim that it costs £27 billion.

fact_check_explanation_title: Mixed evidence on the link between term time holidays and attainment
fact_check_explanation_summary: Department for Education research shows a link between missing school and lower pupil attainment, but this isn’t the case for all types of absence.
In recent years the UK's tax take has varied between 30% and 35% of GDP.

Suicide overtakes other causes of death between six weeks and one year after delivery, when it accounts for 15% of deaths - more than any other pregnancy-related cause.
US corporation tax rates are about 39%, on average according to the OECD, so about twice that paid in the UK.
The UK is still a member of the European Union pending exit negotiations, so budget contributions will continue.

fact_check_explanation_summary: In the third quarter of 2015/16 around 95% of acute NHS trusts were in deficit. But by the end of 2015/16 it was 65% of all NHS trusts, of which …
According to an industry database, half the nightclubs in Great Britain have closed down in the past decade.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is half of the NHS not clinically qualified?
fact_check_explanation_summary: 51% of people working for the NHS are clinically qualified. Looking at it another way, that’s 53% of full-time equivalents.
